textBox.richText: This year’s ski trip was to WP. I decided to forgo the bus, and drive up separately. Chris and Ken both wanted to see some of my favorite trees...so I mostly played tour guide all day. Did laps through upper switchyard and Belle to start off, then played a little under Eagle Wind. At lunch, Ken, Richard and I decided to hike the cirque...ended up getting a snowmobile ride most of the way there (yay! Gotta do that more often...) After lunch was Pine Cliffs, Weather Station, and Runaway...but that side’s snow wasn’t as good as the north facing stuff up top. Still, good day...vid below.
